choose.when: insert into ubReply(idx, refIdx, groupIdx, content, refWriter) values((select nvl(max(idx), 0) + 1 from ubReply), #{refIdx}, (select nvl(max(idx), 0) + 1 from ubReply), #{content}, #{refWriter})
choose.otherwise: insert into ubReply(idx, refIdx, groupIdx, groupNo, depth, content, refWriter) values((select nvl(max(idx), 0) + 1 from ubReply), #{refIdx}, #{groupIdx}, 2, 1, #{content}, #{refWriter})

mapper.select: select count(*) from ubReply where (refIdx = #{refIdx} and deleteCheck = 0) or groupidx in ( select groupidx from ( (select groupidx, count(*) cnt from ubReply where refIdx = #{refIdx} group by groupidx) ) where cnt != 1 )
mapper.update: update ubReply set deleteCheck = 1 where idx = #{idx}
update ubReply set content = #{content}, updateDate = sysdate where idx = #{idx}
